subject: Sledge Hockey
Hockey, Ice
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: Once far behind the Americans and Canadians in developing their sledge hockey program, the Russians proved they were on the right track in a 2-1 upset at the Paralympics in Sochi.
snippet: Once far behind the Americans and Canadians in developing their sledge hockey program, the Russians proved they were on the right track in a 2-1 upset at the Paralympics in Sochi.
